query.statement:
SELECT T.RDATE , (SELECT N.DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.MANDT = W.MANDT AND N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.LANG = 'ko' AND N.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) TEMNM , (SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = W.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND MM028.LANG = 'ko' AND MM028.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS , T.LIFNR , T.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM , T.TEMNO , T.NAMET2 , (SELECT M.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M WHERE M.MANDT = T.MANDT AND M.POSID = T.PSPID) AS ZSITE_NM , (SELECT X.ZSPEC1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = T.MANDT AND X.POSID = T.PSPID ORDER BY X.POSID , X.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS ATYPE , (SELECT X.ZSPEC2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = T.MANDT AND X.POSID = T.PSPID ORDER BY X.POSID , X.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS ZSPEC2 , T.MINWON , T.CNT , T.KUNNR_NM , T.SUPR_DT , T.STATE , T.MAXSEQ , T.PSPID , T.SEQNO FROM ( SELECT A.RDATE ,A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,A.SEQNO ,A.MINWON ,ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PSPID) AS CNT ,A.LIFNR ,C.NAME1 ,A.TEMNO ,B.NAMET AS NAMET2 ,M01.ZZACTSS AS ZZACTSS ,M01.KUNNR_NM ,A.STATE ,A.SUPR_DT ,CASE WHEN A.SEQNO = (SELECT MAX(X.SEQNO) FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1307 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID AND X.RDATE = A.RDATE AND A.STATE <> 'G') THEN 'X' ELSE '' END AS MAXSEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1307 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M01 ON M01.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M01.POSID = A.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE <> 'D' AND A.LIFNR <> ' ' AND (substr(A.RDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M01.PRART = #CHK_GBN2#
UNION ALL SELECT A.RDATE ,A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,A.SEQNO ,A.MINWON ,ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PSPID, A.SUPR_DT) AS CNT ,A.LIFNR ,C.NAME1 ,A.TEMNO --∆¿¿Â M02.NAMET2 ,B.NAMET AS NAMET2 ,M01.ZZACTSS AS ZZACTSS ,M01.KUNNR_NM ,A.STATE ,A.SUPR_DT ,'' AS MAXSEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1307B AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M01 ON M01.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M01.POSID = A.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE <> 'D' AND A.LIFNR <> ' ' AND (substr(A.RDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M01.PRART = #CHK_GBN2#
) AS T INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON T.MANDT = C.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON T.MANDT = W.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = W.LIFNR WHERE W.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' ) AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND T.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND T.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = T.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
ORDER BY T.RDATE WITH UR
